item.title: Lean End User License Agreement
item.description: This End User License Agreement (this "Agreement") is made between Lean Solution ("Lean") and the end-user of Lean’s software ("Licensee"). Licensee intends to use certain Lean products (each, a "Product") and to obtain a subscription license through one of Lean’s third party resellers or integrators (the "Lean Partner"). Licensee will enter a written agreement with the Lean Partner that covers fees, payment provisions and certain license and support terms (the "
